Marthen Christian Warobay (born 12 July 1984) is an Indonesian former footballer who plays as a defender.
International career
In 2007, he played to represent the Indonesia U-23, in 2007 SEA Games.
Honours
Club honors
;Persipura Jayapura
*Liga Indonesia Premier Division (1): 2005
;Sriwijaya
*Liga Indonesia Premier Division (1): 2007–08
*Copa Indonesia/Piala Indonesia (3): 2007–08, 2008–09, 2010
Individual honors
* Liga Indonesia Premier Division Best Player (1): 2005
